channel.title: Giampaolo Rodola - 2017
channel.description: Python enthusiast, core developer, psutil author

item.title: psutil 5.4.0 and AIX support
item.description: After a long time psutil finally adds support for a brand new exotic platform: AIX! Honestly I am not sure how many AIX Python users are out there (I suppose not many) but still, here it is. For this we have to thank Arnon Yaari who started working on the …
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola

item.title: psutil 5.3.0 and full unicode support
item.description: psutil 5.3.0 is finally out. This release is a major one, as it includes tons of improvements and bugfixes, probably like no other previous release. It is interesting to notice how huge the diff between 5.2.2 and 5.3.0 is. This is due to the …
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola

item.title: psutil 5.1.1 system temperature, battery and CPU frequency
item.description:
OK, here's another psutil release. Main highlights of this release are sensors-related APIs.

Temperatures

It is now possible to retrieve hardware temperatures. The relevant commit is here. Unfortunately this is Linux only. I couldn't manage to implement this on other platforms mainly for two reasons:

  • On Windows it is hard …
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola
